author: nc1234
content: Yea either static check on `CHANGES.md`, or we can auto generate (add entry) to `CHANGES.md` on PR merged. The former forces PR creator to edit the md file, the later doesn't. Plugins like https://github.com/marketplace/actions/changelog-ci might be worth looking into
